list_ex_of_english: Patients suffering from obesity were recruited at an out-patient obesity gastric surgery clinic, at time of assessment.

As the majority with gastric cancer present with advanced disease, the prognosis is generally poor.
In undiagnosed gastric cancer patients, it was assumed that all patients were symptomatic within twelve months.
